channel.title: Projects on Irati Hurtado
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Irati Hurtado

item.title: Content Design
item.description: .custom-button { display: inline-block; background-color: #0081FB; color: white; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 999px; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .custom-button span { display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .custom-button:hover span { transform: translateX(5px); } Content design for a feedback survey This is a project I did for the European Union Center at Illinois and which consisted of designing a feedback survey that balanced user experience with data collection needs.

item.title: Conversation Design
item.description: .custom-button { display: inline-block; background-color: #0081FB; color: white; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 999px; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .custom-button span { display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .custom-button:hover span { transform: translateX(5px); } Avant voice AI agent This is a voice AI agent I designed for the US-based fintech company Avant. It is a customer service solution built with a hybrid approach that combines structured flows and generative AI.

item.title: Language Data & Analytics
item.description: .custom-button { display: inline-block; background-color: #0081FB; color: white; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 999px; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .custom-button span { display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .custom-button:hover span { transform: translateX(5px); } Meta AI I worked on Meta AI by labeling and evaluating theÂ AI model that powers the virtual assistant, and by comparing its performance to the performance of similar models developed by other tech companies.
